Name: Maoz
Review Text:
I went there 2 days in a row, their falafel pita pockets are super good! They make it fresh before your eyes and you can choose your own toppings :) Everything is vegan, quickly made and you can find a few of these stores in Amsterdam.
The fries where okay too, just normal fries nothing special

Name: Maoz
Review Text:
Maoz is the best go to fast and healthy vegan foods. I always order a falafel and top it yo my own liking. You can refill your falafel with sauce and vegetables whenever you want until you are done. Exceptional value for your money!!
Always a must go whenever you are in Amsterdam.

Name: Maoz
Review Text:
Ah! Words cannot describe how much I love this place. It's veggie paradise!
Great prices and delicious sauces( I tried their garlic sauce!). They serve pita pockets with an unlimited salad refill.
